alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Lewis; Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 11:48AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL MASON...NORTHERN BRACKEN...NORTHWESTERN LEWIS...SOUTHEASTERN CLERMONT...BROWN... ADAMS...SOUTHWESTERN CLINTON AND HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 PM EST... At 1147 AM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Wilmington to Williamsburg to near Felicity, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Hillsboro, Georgetown, Washington, Mount Orab, West Union, Bethel, Williamsburg, Manchester, Peebles, Ripley, Aberdeen, Lynchburg, New Vienna, Augusta, Winchester, Marshall, Sardinia, Seaman, and Felicity. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
